page.title: 10Two popular games
page.content: {Granny in the kitchen. A skipping game we play is "Granny in the kitchen".Two people turn a rope and another two skip.There is a rhyme which you say as you skip:"Granny in the kitchen,doing a bit of stitching, in came the bogey man and pushed Granny out". When "pushed Granny out" is said one person goes in and the other goes out. {How to play "Blockey 1,2,3".} Somebody is the catcher;she stands at the blockey post and counts to 50. Everyone else has to run away and hide.The aim is to get back to the blockey post without being caught, saying "Blockey 1,2,3" and your name. If the catcher gets back first she says "Blockey 1,2,3" and the other person's name.The person caught first is the next catcher. These are our 2 most popular games.
